<title level="1" right="Spell 8" pfs="Standard">
[Disappearance](/Spells.aspx?ID=1490)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Subtle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=522" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 324 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deity**
[Nyarlathotep (The Veiled Voice)](/Deities.aspx?ID=575)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 target
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 10 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

You shroud a creature from others' senses. The target becomes [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39), not just to sight but to all senses, allowing the target to count as [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26) no matter what precise and imprecise senses an observer might have. It's still possible for a creature to find the target by [Seeking](/Actions.aspx?ID=84), looking for disturbed dust, hearing gaps in the sound spectrum, or finding some other way to discover the presence of an otherwise-undetectable creature.
name: Disappearance
